name: HillBilly Fishing
description:
CONTROLS BELOW

Reel a fish up to catch it!

Level up to unlock new baits!

Earn lots of points for all of your big fish!

Controls - This allows you to control the hook line

Spam Click Up Arrow - (Reel In)

Spam Click Down Arrow - (Let Line Out)

Left Arrow - (Move Line Left)

Right Arrow - (Move Line Right)

Baits - Equipping a bait allows you to not be able to catch smaller fish of equal power to that bait!

Worm Bait - Skips Small Spry Fish

Spry Bait - Skips Small Purple Fish

Small Purple Bait - Skips Large Yellow Fish

Made by Tyson Toller 

Using - Unity- Photoshop- VisualStudio - SoundTrap - BFXR
